isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - SHEET METAL REPAIRS - MAJOR REPAIRS PANEL REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: MAJOR REPAIRS PANEL REPLACEMENT
svcproc.para: Complete or partial panel replacement can also be accomplished if the correct panel fasteners and tools for applying them are available. Ordinary pop-rivets are not sufficient for these kinds of repairs and should NOT be used.

If a panel replacement is to be made, the approved method will include the following. The procedure illustrated is for the right front quarter panel ( Figure 58). It covers all the basic steps required. Other side and back panel replacement is similar but will probably be less difficult.

figure.caption: Figure 58. Cab Right Front Quarter Panel

svcproc.para: For cab structural repair procedures not found in this section, refer to GROUP 16 - CAB, Major Structural Repair in the CTS- 5000 Master Service Manual.
